name: Cradily
author: miki kudo
flavor_text: It has short legs and can’t walk very fast, but its neck and tentacles can extend to over three times their usual length to nab distant prey.

abilities.name: Selective Slime
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose Burned, Confused, or Poisoned. Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Miasma Wind
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage for each Special Condition affecting your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
